title: SMART TRAFFIC MANAGEMENT SYSTEM
description: AI-Powered Traffic Monitoring uses AI, Computer Vision, and Deep Learning for real-time traffic enforcement, including ANPR, vehicle classification, and violation detection, with automated analytics to improve road safety, reduce congestion, and support smart city traffic management.

title: Full Stack Java Journaling Application
description: A full-stack journaling application built using Spring Boot, MySQL, and React. It allows users to write, view, archive, and manage journal entries with checklist support, dark/light mode, and a clean notebook-style UI. The project follows layered architecture and demonstrates frontend-backend integration using REST APIs.
